name: Magika Land of Fantasy
description: Play as a powerful wizard to repeal the attack on your kingdom! Use your spells to survive through an intense journey with deadly enemies and traps to save Magika!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 300 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
